This is a ripple of bug 61866. Due to the fact that a listener didn't get 
removed the undo collector got events it didn't expect.

Added some code to protected for the case that getText can return null which 
can happen in other cases as well.

Created an attachment (id=10595)
Patch that fixes the problem
